Great location but needs improvement,Nice leisurely pool,i got two standard rooms for the christmas holidays and my check-in was great. i was lined-up impatiently, but then they pulled me out for a lower table where i can check-in faster. the rooms were ok, they were the size of standard hotels, though there was no bidet in the toilet and we saw a long curly hair strand in the bathroom, implying it wasn't meticulously cleaned. i'm a bit particular about this. our bags were managed efficiently, too, which i was so happy about since i brought our holiday gifts there as well. the bed was so comfortable i had a good night's sleep. we had breakfast in heat, and though half of the servers were good, half seemed to be rude, probably wanting to go home on a holiday.

Lovely hotel and service with a smile,close to everything,I love the place, that is why I keep on going back everytime we visit manila. People are polite and very respectful. It is very accessible to all the places we usually visit. And of course, shopping, which I am very excited to do. When friends and relatives visit us, it is close to where they stay. Perfect for me.

great hotel,nice staff and good service,My stay was pleasant. The staff was good and very nice. Overall, the hotel is very clean as well as the room. Concierge was excellent, very good service indeed. I left my cel phone and I recovered it without difficulty. We he ate lunch at the HEAT and the food was great indeed.

Great pool - great breakfast,Urgent trveller to stay one night,the rooms are silent and the bed very large - gives a good sleep. the breakfast was very impressive - you have to take time to get everything out of it. however - breakfast should be included in the rooms price at this pricelevel. the most unconvenient happening was after i had signed out. my taxi to the airport wanted paying in cash in advance. when i tried to change money for that, the girl in reception only told me that it is impossible while i had already signed out - they want to serve only those people who are living there. she adviced me to go mall - obviously somewhere nearby. i cannot understand this kind of behaviour in 5 star hotel.

Lovely hotel with world-class service,amazing breakfast buffet, great service, friendly staff,the front desk staff were very nice and accommodating. breakfast buffet at heat is a must-try - it has a wide variety of choices and offers good value for your money. senju is also a good place for japanese food. rooms are always kept clean and tidy. location is great for shopping as well. it was a great hotel experience.

great experience n service was awesome,location, near shopping malls, everyone was great help,My stay was awesome from the ride from airport. I was happy to see the driver service from airport, iwas traveling by myself so the service came as a relief. The service was excellent, i was escorted to my room and even had a power adapter put in so i could use my laptop. The hotel has its own mall and is also right next the mega mall. The Greenhills mall was only 15 minutes away. Great shopping experience. Next time im in phillipines I will definately stay here again. Thanks lance

Good place for business,attentive staff,the hotel meets the expectations of a shangri-la hotel. the staffs were very attentive and respond promptly for all needs. you can also arrange a hotel car to bring you around manila - a good arrangement if you need to travel around the city a lot.

95% of the staff are very kind ,the lobby are great to have little business chats and for relaxing time also the room size is fine,my room was in the 16th floor and some of the rooms in the same floor was friends and they made a lot of noise thrugh nights and there was a very strong shisha smile in the floor , but to be fair the room service staff and the house keeping were very great workers and they did very 5 satr service.

Great hotel to stay and relax staff very friendly,Quality service of staff, lounge bar and entertainment,Only stayed 2 night wish it was longer to use all the facilities. The service was very good, nothing to much to ask. The lounge bar and entertainment was excellent for relaxing, unwinding and drinking before going out for nightlife. The room and bed were top class. It was nice to have a big bed for a change in Asia being a 6'2" European. Breakfast choices and variety the most I've seen in a hotel. The only down side was if your late, long queues form to get seated but the food quality makes up for the wait.

Comfortable Environment & Good locations,Nice and Easy Access to 2 Big Shopping Mall,comfortable enviroment and spacious room. 2 big shopping malls located just on the right and left of the hotel within walking distance of 5 mins. shang plaze mall can just be cutover from the hotel lobby under shelter no worries when it rains. there are many shops and choices of food available in the malls, the prices are reasonable. the upsell of the package to club floor is too expensive though the food and wide spread of liquors and wines are fabulous. check-out service needs improvements, advise to give additional 30 mins for check-out otherwise delay to the airport can be expected.

Huge complex with all facilities,Breakfast! The breakfast was beyond anything i have seen anywere. Like 8 different fresh juices.. so many cakes, hot meals.. unbelievable. Get up early and eat at this hotel, or you loose out!!,The rooms are kind of small and ordinary. I thought a "Deluxe" room would give me some space to stay in and some deluxe feeling, but nah.. i could have stayed at best western if the room is what is important, and it is for this price. Whats the point in big fancy hallways if the room isnt the same? The service at the hotel is perfect, almost too much cause they even call to confirm everything. But i rather confirm positive on the phone then to wait for poor service other places:) All in all.. I might come back, but not sure. Probably better for buisness-people. I also miss some form for entertainment in the evenings.. Live music or something to ease the mind and relax behind a drink..

edsa shangri-la ... need i say more?,Chi The Spa!,What can I say? it basically says it all in its name ... where do I begin? I had great service from the moment I entered the door, all the staff were professional, rooms and facilities were great, food was exceptional, CHI the spa, great experience, ... this place was so great, it made me come back here a second time, compared to its sister Makati Shangri-la? I would prefer this one.

Fantastic hotel,Location is very good,my entire family spent mother's day in this fabulous hotel. the moment you enter their grand lobby, you wouldn't even think that you are actually in manila. the view of the garden from the lobby lounge is a sight to behold. the rooms are big enough for a family of 4. the beds are comfortable enough for our one night stay. dinner at the heat is worth every peso you pay for it. the staff are attentive, well-trained and our younger brother enjoyed the pool. the hotel is a little bit dated but it certainly lives up to the shangri-la standards.

Very Lovely & secured 5-star hotel,Lovely ambiance, proximity to shopping center & overall elegance & staff support,i had stayed at dusit thani hotel before transferring to eads and i find both hotels very distingushed...with eads providing more of a corporate ambiance and less traffic growings at its entrance and the arts and furnitures and architecture were all very elegant and provided a very corporate ambiance for business meetings...another distinguishing aspect of this hotel is the immediate access to internet and wi-fi services and staff were extremely well trained, mannered and eager to provide support and assistance...i had a great experience and a hotel i hope to stay in again with my family on my next visit!

Relatively courteous service,Convenient location, courteous front desk staff, other staff were alert to help, complete amenities,i was just disappointed with one of their reception staff who answered a query i had about fast-food deliveries to the hotel. she instructed me to ask the rider to go to the lobby and have him call our room so that we could meet him there. an hour after the delivery was supposedly made, we found out riders wen't allowed in the lobby and the one who was making the delivery had to go to another entrance altogether. it was a shame, had we been given the correct instructions to begin with, my husband could've met the delivery boy at the right entrance, which was the garden wing. we had to cancel our order and deal with our hungry kids in the room.

service,great service,the service is great, and the hotel has all the amenities you may need. Traffic in the area can be seen as terrible and getting around Manila could be troublesome if you need to be on the other side of the city

Great facilities and service that you would expect,Location, facilities, spa,Always great staying here. The rooms are great, the hotel complex is very big, modern, and has a good atmosphere. The pool area is very nice and great place to take kids. Garden Wing is newer, and the Chi Premier Rooms there are the nicest in the hotel. Take the garden wing exit to get to the mall quicker, you can also get a taxi from this exit as well.

Large, comfortable, and excellent staff,Location is near everything you need, restaurants, shopping, supermarket, etc.,this hotel was more than i expected even though i saw photos of it online. the room we stayed in had two good sized rooms with bathrooms in both and the living/dining/kitchenette was so convenient to have and use. yes everything you need to cook your own meal in the room is all there. the location is the best, it is nearby everything you need, restaurants are right outside the door, a supermarket is around the corner, shopping only feet away, a small pharmacy is around the corner, etc.! the service was really great all around. i highly recommend this hotel! the only thing to watch out for are the taxi drivers. some of them will take you for a ride!!!

A lovely staycation thanks to a great hotel,great staff, complete room amenities,we booked an overnight stay through agoda basically for a staycation (as we're from metro manila). we had a great time! the staff was more than helpful on a lot of things from breakfast arrangements to parking passes. the room though was a favorite. it's really the little touches that matter. like the 2 toothbrushes are not identical to avoid switching. a weighing scale in the bathroom and a little clothes hamper were nice. the bed made for very good sleep. love the pillows! nice, big, and fluffy. very very comfortable. the deal we got through agoda was a good one which made the choice to stay here a no-brainer. will be doing this again some time soon!

Wish I would have stayed here sooner!,Loction, Service and Price,This hotel was great! The staff was always smiling and they were always on time in providing what you needed before you even asked. Food was great! A mall was in walking distance. I can go on and on. My stay... speechless! Thank you!

great location, good service, ,the staff are friendly, pool is magnificent,The hotel is still lovely even if its several years old. The staff were all friendly, hotel securities are polite and helpful. As expected....first class,Only decent hotel in the area, staff are excellent.,You get what you pay for in Asia. Astounding service,Good location with comfort,Booked a superior tower room but was upgraded to a deluxe garden which was very comfortable and spacious. Good location for access to most parts of Manila which one must consider given the heavy traffic. Excellent service and friendly staff. Great choice for Manila.,Service, physical layout.,Excellent price-quality ratio for Asian hotel. Service as good as we have seen anywhere, everything attended to immediately. I have no complaint about the frequent smiling "good morning sirs". Free wi-fi in rooms a plus. Tower rooms need upgrading to flat screen TV but ours was clean and comfortable. Buffet breakfast expensive by local standards but huge number of choices and good quality. Chinese restaurant very expensive with ridiculous wine markup ($75 for $15 bottle) - food quality good however.

Outstanding place to stay,Everything from the Decor, to the food, to the customer service to the cleanliness,none,The absolute best hotel I have ever stayed at in my life. I use to work at a hotel back home in the U.S. and loved it, so I know what goes into quality and top service. That being said, out of all the hotels I have stayed at in my life.... this also includes the ones in Las Vegas, this by far was the best I had ever stayed at. I am a stickler for cleanliness and customer service and never have I ever experienced all the qualities combined in one Hotel like I have at the Edsa Shangri-la Manila Hotel. They go above and beyond to ensure you are satisfied with everything. No other hotel experience comes close. Outstanding place to stay guarenteed.

Edsa Shangri La,Location, secure,View,This hotel is centrally located, walking distance to excellent shopping and restaurants. Hotel security is top notch. Staff is very professional.
